name: FriEND (Enticholy)
description:
Hi there. 

Friend is more of an experience then a game, it's a short experience that lasts around 5 minutes. 

You explore the world around you and meet new friends along the way as your life progresses. Unfortunately you're not very lucky. 

This game has some very minimal horror elements, so yeah. 

The game probably has some minor bugs

Controls: 

WASD or arrows - movement

Shift

Space

Tab - BE CAREFUL WITH TAB (because it takes you to the menu and you'll lose progress if you accidentally press it)

That's it hope you enjoy!
